snippet: The JOBS Act illustrates a lack of knowledge about financial markets, and may end up hurting them — just the opposite of what Congress intended.
abstract: The JOBS Act illustrates a lack of knowledge about financial markets, and may end up hurting them — just the opposite of what Congress intended.

headline.main: From Congress, a Law Befitting a Sausage Factory
headline.print_headline: Deal Professor: From Congress Comes a Law Befitting a Sausage Factory
